channel.title: game on Romain Lespinasse
channel.description: Recent content in game on Romain Lespinasse

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Labyrinth (Day 7)
item.description: From the dock to the garden, go door to door. Except some houses have door between them, some don’t. It’s depends of the colors of the houses. Such a colorful labyrinth! Can you find the right path? Labyrinth Explore it yourself in Townscaper

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Fortress (Day 6)
item.description: Big blue, the fortress of the sea. The lighthouse is for the decorum, obviously. Far away Meet Big Blue Port access High ground

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Eyrie (Day 5)
item.description: From his sea eyrie, the Lighthouse keeper watch over passing ships. Sea eyrie Lighthouse Eagle nest Explore it yourself in Townscaper JiZ_FaAynnjf_Udu5H-8Z4cqv5H-8G7fxmLcu5H-8D5kct-58WzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWzWCASUzPGT2un5xewP_5DvJH7XIn3MePPsX4T9N-4n-Ams9iycPwhNX4cqwNPH

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Canal (Day 4)
item.description: A canal can have many forms The obvious one, The little one, The aerial one, The hidden one. Canals overview Obvious canal Little canal Aerial canal

item.title: Townscaper | Creation | Always together
item.description: When you’re separated from your people, you always find a way to get through it. Separate by walls Can't see your people Unable to communicate You find a way

item.title: Townscaper | Creation | Tetris island
item.description: Welcome to the Tetris island … and yes, the island float, we are aware of it. Far away Aerial view Game 1 Game 2

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Neighbours (Day 3)
item.description: Sometimes, being a good neighbour is a difficult task. If you’re too close, your neighbours and you can disappear in an instant. Welcome to the Tetris neighborhood. Meet the neighboors ... or not From space

item.title: Townscaper | Daily Challenge | Garden (Day 2)
item.description: A Garden bring colors in your life. Island Garden district Colors across the city ... or not From space Explore it yourself in Townscaper

item.description: See some Minas Tirith on twitter, so here the Sauron tower Barad-dûr to match them.
